original_text: So they sent back one of the priests that they had caught and taken away to Assyria. He went to live in Bethel. He taught the people how to worship the Lord properly.
korean_text: 이에 사마리아에서 사로잡혀 간 제사장 중 한 사람이 와서 벧엘에 살며 백성에게 어떻게 여호와 경외할지를 가르쳤더라

sentences.original_text: So they sent back one of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 제사장 중 한 사람을 돌려보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: that they had caught and taken away to Assyria
He went to live in Bethel
He taught the people how to worship the Lord properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 주님을 올바르게 경배하는 법을 가르쳤습니다
